about_the_game:
Overview

STRETCHER MEN is a thrilling action game where you must transport a patient on a stretcher to a distant clinic without letting them fall off. Players control two characters, one at the front and one at the back of the stretcher, and must navigate through various obstacles while maintaining balance. With simple yet deep gameplay, your attention and coordination skills will be put to the test.

Key Features

Individual Control: Operate the characters at the front and back of the stretcher separately, keeping balance as you move forward.
Challenging Levels: Face various obstacles and terrains that will challenge your skills.

What Players Can Do

Control the characters at the front and back of the stretcher, carefully advancing without dropping the patient.
Overcome obstacles and rugged paths to safely transport the patient to the clinic.

STRETCHER MEN is an exciting action game that tests your skills and precision. Play now and become the ultimate stretcher-bearing master!

name: STRETCHER MEN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Core i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: "STRETCHER MEN" is an action game where you transport a patient on a stretcher. Control characters at the front and back, avoiding obstacles to safely reach the clinic. Simple yet deep gameplay tests your attention and coordination.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
